sentences.english: A novel infantile enemator belongs to the technical field of medical equipment.

sentences.english: Conclusion Air enema is the best methods in treat and diagnose infant intussusception.

sentences.english: The utility model provides a novel infant enema fixer, belonging to the medical treatment tool technical field.

sentences.english: Except the normal control group, experimental colitis was induced in all mice by oxazolone enema.

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To establish a method for the identification of Hongxiong Enema by TLC.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立紅芎灌腸液的薄層色譜鑑別方法。

sentences.english: Enemas are simply unable to accomplish this range of therapeutic benefits.

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the value of barium enema and CT examination in diagnosis of colonic cancer.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討鋇灌腸和CT檢查在結腸癌診斷中的價值。

sentences.english: Even taking laxative or enema stool will be discharged.
sentences.chinese: 甚至服用瀉藥或灌腸才能將大便排出。

sentences.english: Results The drip-type enema retention enema treatment more effective than proctitis.
sentences.chinese: 結果滴注式灌腸治療直腸炎效果優於保留灌腸。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the treatment effect of clyster with da-cheng-qi soup for hepatitis gravis.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察大承氣湯加味灌腸治療重型肝炎的臨牀療效。

sentences.english: E. With container at hip level, open clamp and begin instillation.
sentences.chinese: 容器置於臀部水平位置，打開夾子開始灌腸。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To observe the therapeutic effect of Dachengqi Decoction mixed with barium in the treatment of large intestine obstruction.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察大承氣湯調鋇劑灌腸診治大腸梗阻的效果。

sentences.english: Filled Sausage is one of the special snacks in Beijing.

sentences.english: Objective To optimize the extraction procedure of total saponins from Radix notoginseng for compound Huangqi Changning enemA.
sentences.chinese: 目的優選複方黃芪腸寧灌腸劑中三七的最佳提取工藝。
